hitRating.description: Hit Rating increases chance to hit (reduces miss chance)

critRating.description: Critical Strike Rating increases critical strike chance

hasteRating.description: Haste Rating increases attack speed and cast speed

expertiseRating.description: Expertise Rating reduces enemy dodge and parry chance

defenseRating.description: Defense Rating increases defense skill and reduces chance to be crit

resilienceRating.description: Resilience Rating reduces damage taken from players and chance to be crit

spellHitRating.description: Spell Hit Rating increases spell hit chance (reduces spell miss chance)

spellCritRating.description: Spell Critical Strike Rating increases spell critical strike chance

spellHasteRating.description: Spell Haste Rating increases cast speed

level80.description: Defense cap for level 80 (5.6% crit reduction, requires 689 Defense Rating above base)

level70.description: Defense cap for level 70 (5.6% crit reduction, requires 689 Defense Rating above base)

spirit.description: 1 Spirit = 0.1 Mana Regen/sec (while not casting), 0.05 Health Regen/sec
